price: Wọn kò lè dìde nàró. Wọn kò sì lè ran ara wọn lọ́wọ́.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
